title: Ep114: Astrological Heaux feat Mecca Woods
itunes:title: Ep114: Astrological Heaux feat Mecca Woods
description:
On this week's episode the duo are joined by astrologist Mecca Woods to discuss astrology as it pertains to relationships and sex. Find out if your sign is keeping you from happiness or simply if it's all fluff. Which signs are compatible and should you determine your love life based on the stars? We dig deep into the meaning of astrology, what it means, and how you can use it as a guide. Follow our guest Mecca Woods on Instagram @1meccanism or Twitter @TheMeccanism Also check out her website www.mylifecreated.com and her book "Astrology for Happiness and Success" available now at Barnes & Noble, Amazon, Target or wherever you may find your favorite books This episode was brought to you by: Adam & Eve- Receive 50% off almost any one item, Free DVDs, a mystery gift and FREE shipping using our code: WD50 at checkout at adamandeve.com Lola- Get 40% off your subscription using our code: WDP at checkout at mylola.com ScentBird- Get 50% off your first month today! That's right, only $7.50 for your first fragrance using out code: WD or visiting scentbird.com/WD for 50% off your first month Want to support Whoreible Decisions and receive 3 bonus episodes every month? Become a patron now at Patreon.com/Whoreibledecisions for as little as $5 per month. Use hashtag #WhoreibleDecisions and tag @whoreiblepod on Twitter when talking about this week's episode!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
